items.title: #REFLEXION || VIDA EN USA 🇺🇸  Quién te dijo que emigrar a...
items.content_html:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

#REFLEXION || VIDA EN USA 🇺🇸
Quién te dijo que emigrar a otro país te daría la gran vida? Pués te cuento que te mintió ...emigrar es trabajar de lo que salga ( que sea Honesto y Honrado) es aguantar insultos, ofensas,gritos, es levantarte muy de madrugada y acostarte muy de noche,a veces hasta dormir en la calle es callar y llorar en silencio, es dejar de comprarte algo para ahorrar, es luchar cada día...no tienes idea lo que cuesta ganarce 100 dólares o euros...dormirte con... dolor en los pies en la espalda...querer abrazar a alguien al terminar la jornada y solo tienes a tu almohada, es querer tener alas para volar e irte
Es eso y más ...asi que si un familiar te envía auque sea 10 dólares ora por ella o el ...ya que no tienes ideas de lo que le costó ganárselo...así que solo te pido algo ora mucho por los emigrantes, no te burles de ellos😪 Solo Dios es testigo de lo que se sufre😢

See More#REFLEXION || LIFE IN USA 🇺🇸 Who told you emigrating to another country would give you the great life? Well I tell you that he lied to you... emigrating is working from what comes out (be honest and honest) is enduring insults, offenses, screams, is waking up very early and sleeping very late at night, sometimes even sleeping on the street is Shut up and cry in silence, is stop buying something to save, it's fighting every day... you have no idea what it costs to win 100 dollars or euros... sleep with pain in your feet in your back... want to love Hugging someone at the end of the day and you only have your pillow, is wanting to have wings to fly and leave It's that and more... so if a relative sends you even if it's 10 dollars pray for her or him... since you have no ideas of what it took to earn it... so I just ask for something pray a lot for immigrants, don't make fun of them 😪 Only God witnesses what you suffer 😢Translated

items.title: Pictured here are Kesha, her husband Pablo, and their daughter...
items.content_html:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Pictured here are Kesha, her husband Pablo, and their daughter Leah. You might recognize Kesha and Leah from their incredible work at the @abolishicedenver encampment that took place in front of the GEO detention center in Aurora this summer. Kesha and Leah spent 79 days camped there advocating for Pablo’s freedom and the freedom of all people detained inside. Kesha’s work—leading nightly vigils, talking with media, selling t-shirts, helped raise thousands of dollars not just... for her husband’s legal costs but also those of other impacted families. Her advocacy also led to the universal COVID testing provided at the facility (at that time, one of only two in the country to test everyone inside). On July 11 her husband was transferred to Teller county in retaliation for their activism, but Kesha stayed at GEO advocating for the liberation of all detainees. Support her this weekend by buying tacos. tinyurl.com/solidaritymealsaugust22 @ Denver, Colorado

See More

items.title: Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.Jeanette Vizguerra had been a leader of the immigrant rights movement in...
items.content_html:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Jeanette Vizguerra had been a leader of the immigrant rights movement in Colorado and nationally for over 20 years. She started organizing as a member of the @s...eiu105 and went on to help found @co_immigrant, the Metro Denver Sanctuary Coalition, MUJERR, Sanctuary4All, and @abolishicedenver. Since Jeanette is under an active deportation order, she’s been doing this work from sanctuary in a church in Denver. This weekend, she’s selling tamales—the same ones she distributed at the DPS teacher strike in 2019. Order at tinyurl.com/solidaritymealsaugust22 @ Denver, Colorado

See More

items.content_html:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Jeanette Vizguerra had been a leader of the immigrant rights movement in Colorado and nationally for over 20 years. She started organizing as a member of the @seiu105 and went on to help found @co_immigrant, the Metro Denver Sanctuary Coalition, MUJERR, Sanctuary4All, and @abolishicedenver. Since Jeanette is under an active deportation order, she’s been doing this work from sanctuary in a church in Denver. This weekend, she’s selling tamales—the same ones she distributed at the DPS teacher strike in 2019. Order at tinyurl.com/solidaritymealsaugust22 @ Denver, Colorado

items.title: https://www.facebook.com/244429502833301/posts/459029841373265/
items.content_html:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

https://www.facebook.com/244429502833301/posts/459029841373265/

Abolish ICE Denver

URGENT ALERT (English translation follows)

Alerta familias del Distrito de DPS tenemos información de que ICE está utilizando nuevas tácticas haciendo llamadas... haciéndose pasar por maestros pidiendo su información para el programa de visitas en casa por favor de no dar ningún tipo de información verifiquen en la escuela de sus hijos si saben de alguna familia que les han echo estas llamadas haciéndose pasar por los maestros de sus hijos déjenos saber o si alguien a sido detenido bajo este engañó contácteme para proveer apoyo teléfono #720 329 06 57 esta información a sido confirmada por Susana Cordova Superintendents de DPS y nuestra responsabilidad es prevenir a nuestras comunidades y familias . Recuerden tener el número de respuesta rápida en caso de interacción con ICE es el #1844 864 83 41 opción #1 para redadas daremos seguimiento a esto y no compartan información sin verificar con los maestros de sus hijos y la escuela

________________________________

ALERT: Families of Denver Public School district:
We have information that ICE is using new tactics: making calls posing as teachers asking for their information for the home visits program. Please do not give any type of information! Check with your children's school!

If you know of any family who have received these calls from people posing as the teachers of their children, let us know; or if someone has been arrested under this deception contact Jeanette Vizguerra! This information has been confirmed by Susana Cordova, Superintendent of DPS.

Our responsibility is to protect our communities and families. Remember to have the quick response number in case of interaction with ICE: (844) 864-8341 option #1 for raids
